actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Noise Control Act of 1972 to provide certain restrictions on aircraft noise.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Aviation Administration to prescribe standards for the control of aircraft noise and sonic boom which do not permit a decibel level for Supersonic aircraft higher than the decibel level permitted under regulations prescribed pursuant to the Noise Control Act with respect to other aircraft. Prohibits operation of any civil aircraft after June 1, 1978, unless such aircraft complies with FAA Standards for the control of aircraft noise and Sonic boom.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Noise Control Act of 1972 to provide certain restrictions on aircraft noise.
